articles.title: Kim Jong Il Nominated as Candidate for Deputy to SPA across Country
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Nominated as Candidate for Deputy to SPA across Country
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Voters' meetings were held at all the constituencies across the country to nominate candidates for deputies to the 12th Supreme Peoples' Assembly of the DPRK.
					 The meetings nominated General Secretary Kim Jong Il as a candidate for deputy to the 12th SPA.
					
					Reporters and speakers at the meetings highly praised the immortal feats performed by Kim Jong Il, adding that it is the greatest happiness and glory of our country and the nation to have Kim Jong Il in the van of the revolution.
					
					 The voters of the meetings courteously proposed the nomination of Kim Jong Il as a candidate for deputy to the 12th SPA at their constituencies and all the participants in the meetings expressed unanimous support and approval of it.
					
					 It was solemnly declared at the meetings that Kim Jong Il was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the SPA of the constituencies.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit International Friendship Exhibition
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, a chairperson of a friendly party and leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the International Friendship Exhibition House on Feb. 8 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					The participants laid bouquets and made bows before the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Hyangsan Township.
					
					 Then, they visited the International Friendship Exhibition House.
					
					 They paid tribute to the sculpture portraying Kim Jong Il in the introductory hall.
					
					 They visited halls in which the gifts presented to him by heads of party and state leaders of many countries of the world and figures from all walks of life are displayed.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that foreigners speak highly of Kim Jong Il who performed undying feats for the cause of global independence, they looked round the gifts on display.

articles.title: Cambodian King Pays Respects to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cambodian King Pays Respects to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni sent a large basket of flowers to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Written on the ribbon of the basket were letters reading "Glory to H.E. Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni."
					
					Upon the authorization of the king, a delegation of the Ministry of the Royal Palace of Cambodia led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the royal palace, visited the DPRK embassy on February 3 to lay the floral basket before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Great King of Cambodia Pays Respects to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Great King of Cambodia Pays Respects to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Great King of Cambodia Norodom Sihanouk sent a large basket of flowers to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Written on the ribbon of the basket were letters reading "Glory to H.E. Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Cambodian Great King Norodom Sihanouk."
					
					Upon the authorization of the great king, a delegation of the Ministry of the Royal Palace of Cambodia led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the royal palace, visited the DPRK embassy on February 3, 2009  to place the floral basket before the portraits of President
						Kim Il Sung and  Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Students Make Study Tour
articles.content:
Students Make Study Tour
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Students in Pyongyang made a study tour of the Oun Revolutionary Site on Saturday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					The revolutionary site is associated with the immortal revolutionary history of Kim Jong Il who conducted energetic ideological, theoretical and military activities and showed warm loving care for campers from Aug. 20 to Oct. 4, Juche 51 (1962).
					
					The participants of the study tour held a starting ceremony before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue.
					
					 At the ceremony Ri Kun Chol, first secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, called on all the participants to deeply grasp the great idea and undying exploits performed by the Songun brilliant commander, prepare themselves to be fortress and shield for devotedly defending the leader and demonstrate the spirit of successors to the Songun revolutionary cause and young vanguards in building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The schoolchildren who arrived at the revolutionary site shouting slogans and singing revolutionary songs looked round the revolutionary relics and data preserved there with good care.
					
					 They held a poem recitation meeting before the monument of dedicated poem at the revolutionary site.

articles.title: Collection of Works Published
articles.content:
Collection of Works Published
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Collection of works "My Country Shining under the Guidance of the General" was published by the Education Books Publishing House.
					 Contained in the book are at least 190 works written by teachers, kindergarteners and students of middle and primary schools and kindergartens.
					
					 Such works as lyric poems "Flag of the Republic" and "Song of Election," words of song "Office Room of the General" and children's verse "Motherland Being Rejuvenated" impressively tell that the country is shining brilliantly all over the world under the guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Among them are allegories, short stories, essays, children's verses and nursery rimes and other writings which are marked by originality of ideas and literary revelation and lively represent mentality of pupils and children.
					
					 There are also notes and writings on experience dealing with the achievements and experiences gained by educationists in the course of education.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Denounced for Pushing Inter-Korean Relations to Total Severance
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Denounced for Pushing Inter-Korean Relations to Total Severance
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A "hearing" on Hyon In Thaek, who was nominated as minister of "Unification" by Lee Myung Bak, will be held at the "National Assembly" of south Korea on February 9. In this regard, Minju Joson Sunday runs a signed commentary. 
					 No one can predict what more serious crisis will occur in the north-south relations that were already put at deadlock if Hyon In Thaek, anti-DPRK confrontational fanatic and sycophantic traitor serving the U.S., is allowed to become minister of "Unification," the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are hardening their resolution to certainly force Hyon to pay for his crime of coming out to mastermind the confrontation with fellow countrymen as a cat's paw serving Lee Myung Bak. If he is allowed to hold the post of the minister of "Unification," the inter-Korean relations will grow worse and be pushed to collapse.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak's nomination of Hyon In Thaek who invented the watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" as minister of "Unification" only shows that "respect" for the north-south declarations touted by him is a whopping lie and that he remains unchanged in his stand to pursue confrontational policy with fellow countrymen.
					
					 If any crisis occurs in the inter-Korean relations due to the imprudent measure, traitor Lee Myung Bak will be held fully accountable for it.

articles.title: Struggle for Peace and Global Independence Urged
articles.content:
Struggle for Peace and Global Independence Urged
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The progressive people of the world should properly understand the danger of aggression and war moves of the imperialists and get unity to thoroughly check and foil them, thus accelerating the building of a peaceful new world where all countries and peoples live and develop independently and equally, says Rodong Sinmun today in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the common aspiration and desire of humankind to live and develop in an independent way.
					
					 Any country deprived of its sovereignty can never shape the independent policy nor realize the aspiration and desire of its nation. That is why peoples have struggled against any practices intended to violate the sovereignty.
					
					 There were turns and twists in the course of advance of history, but the peoples' struggle for independence have emerged victorious and the popular masses have vigorously advanced holding the helm of the era as the driving forces of the development of history.
					
					Without struggle against aggression and war, domination and plunder by the imperialists, it is impossible for the peoples to defend the sovereignty of their countries and, furthermore, realize global independence.
					
					 It is possible to prevent a war and ensure global peace only when the progressive peoples of the world aspiring after independence and peace turn out in the anti-imperialist and anti-war struggle under the uplifted banner of preserving peace.
					
					 As history advances by peoples' struggle, global independence is to be realized successfully by the united struggle of the popular masses.
					
					 The Korean people will preserve peace on the Korean Peninsula and accelerate the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of the anti-imperialist and anti-war struggle, thus greatly contributing to the realization of global independence.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Army's Joint Military Exercises Flailed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Army's Joint Military Exercises Flailed
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of south Korean puppet army frantically conducted joint military exercises aimed at the invasion of the DPRK, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 A mechanized combat brigade of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the 26th mechanized infantry division of the puppet army staged madcap drill of taking tanks and armored cars across the River Hanthan in Ryonchon County, Kyonggi Province on Feb. 5.
					
					 The military exercises are aimed at raising river-crossing ability in the winter season as evidenced by the fact that the puppet army staged the operation of taking the mechanized attack means across the river being covered by tanks of the U.S. forces, fanning up war hysteria.
					
					 The 53rd infantry division of the puppet army and the transport command of the U.S. Navy in south Korea staged a "joint training for coping with terrorism" in Pusan Port the next day.
					
					 The warmongers whipped up confrontational hysteria under the pretext of "coping with terrorism" by mobilizing ten organs including the Pusan District Police Office and the fire-fighting headquarters of Pusan City.
					
					 The frantic exercises staged by the Lee Myung Bak warlike forces who put the inter-Korean relations in total stalemate and drove the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war through their reckless anti-DPRK confrontational moves will only precipitate their ruin.

articles.title: Repeal of Anti-DPRK Policy Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of Anti-DPRK Policy Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions made public a statement on Feb. 3 urging traitor Lee Myung Bak to drop his hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 The statement charged that since its emergence the Lee Myung Bak regime has staged anti-DPRK war exercises threatening peace in succession, crying out for "preemptive strike" at the north and pursued the policy for "strengthened alliance" with the U.S.
					
					 Lee seeks to nominate as a minister the person who invented the watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" and called for abolition of the "Ministry of Unification," it pointed out, adding that such action is intended to bedevil the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Saying that peace of the Korean Peninsula has been plunged into a serious crisis entirely due to the confrontational policy of the Lee Myung Bak "government," it bitterly denounced treacherous and anti-reunification "government" for driving the destiny of the nation to doom.
					
					 The statement urged Lee to immediately retract the hostile policy toward the DPRK, properly understanding the gravity of the situation and opt for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Suppression of Hanchong Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Hanchong Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Measure Committee for Frustrating the Plot to Fake up the Case for Suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea on February 2 released a statement bitterly denouncing the supreme court for having made an unjust decision labeling the south Korean Council of Youth Organizations (Hanchong) an "enemy-benefiting organization" and sentenced its former Chairman Jon Sang Bong to servitude.
					 The present "government" has bedeviled the north-south relations while cracking down on reunification movement organizations, the statement pointed out, adding the said decision proves that the authorities admitted themselves as an anti-reunification and dictatorial "government."
					
					 The people will never pardon the judiciary authorities which made such decision contrary to the trend of the times, it said, expressing the determination to fight it out to expel the present "government" repressing the reunification movement organizations by invoking the evil law.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar took place in Democratic Congo, a Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition in Indonesia, a reading session in Guinea and round-table talks in Ecuador between Jan. 24 and 31 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were books, photos and fine art works showing the immortal exploits of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Kamwiziku Octave, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo who is secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted in his speech at the joint seminar that guided by the Juche idea, the revolutionaries of Korea waged the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle under the leadership of President
						Kim Il Sung to liberate the country and won a great victory in the three-year Fatherland Liberation War by humbling the arrogant U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The Korean people are now making signal successes in building a great prosperous and powerful nation, true to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 Kanga Ngerien Jerom, chairman of the Group for the Study of     Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, and other speakers stressed that the Juche idea is the man-centered idea and the revolutionary philosophy. 
					
					 Ristiyanto, chairman of the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, said at the exhibition-opening ceremony that the DPRK is shining as a powerful socialist country under the distinguished Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. And he declared that the association would strive to develop the friendly relations between the two countries in the future.
					
					 The president of a university in Indonesia noted that they are greatly encouraged by the looks of DPRK which is dynamically advancing towards a great prosperous and powerful nation while meeting every challenge of the hostile forces under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Struggle of WPK and People of Korea Supported
articles.content:
Struggle of WPK and People of Korea Supported
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, and Christopher Coleman, spokesman (leader) of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), on Feb. 5 met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea on a visit to Britain.
					 Andy Brooks said that the Juche idea founded by President         Kim Il Sung is brightly illumining the road to be followed by the world progressives as a great idea.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the Workers' Party and people of Korea would achieve great success in the efforts to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Christopher Coleman said that his party is greatly encouraged by the WPK defending and advancing socialism victoriously true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) fully supports the Workers' Party and people of Korea in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and reunify the country, he declared.
